common.tagline: Connect alumni, inspire mentorship, fuel lifelong belonging.

footer.about: KöprüMezun is a modern community platform that connects graduates, students, and mentors to communicate, form groups, run events, share opportunities, and support each other—built in Türkiye with data hosted domestically.

hero.title: A bilingual alumni community platform designed for trust and momentum.
hero.subtitle: Launch white-label alumni, student, and mentor experiences with feed, forums, mentoring, jobs, analytics, and SSO—fully localized for Türkiye.

featureHighlights.description: Moderated, tagged, and translated conversations keep every cohort engaged in context.

featureHighlights.title: Structured mentoring
featureHighlights.description: Match mentors and mentees with goals, progress tracking, and flash mentoring in one workspace.

featureHighlights.description: Real-time dashboards for engagement, giving, and volunteerism mapped to advancement KPIs.

header.name: Ece Korkmaz
header.headline: Director of Alumni Relations · Community Builder

page.summary: Designing alumni experiences that unite graduates, students, and mentors around real outcomes.

highlights: 15+ years leading advancement and mentoring programs
Certified ScrumMaster® · CASE Executive Leadership Cohort alumnus

content: I build alumni, student, and mentor ecosystems that combine data-informed outreach with deeply human storytelling.
Today I lead bilingual community journeys for KöprüMezun University while coaching advancement teams on campaign design and volunteer enablement.

experience.description: Leading a cross-functional team delivering alumni engagement, mentoring, and fundraising programs.
achievements: Launched bilingual alumni portal with 18k members and GDPR-compliant workflows.
Increased mentor-mentee matches by 42% with sprint coaching models.
Co-created annual impact storytelling series viewed by 12k alumni.

experience.description: Partnered with universities and NGOs to design community platforms and donor journeys.
achievements: Implemented integrated CRM and event stack for three institutions in under nine months.
Produced mentor playbooks adopted by 120+ volunteer leaders.
Drove ₺750K in new recurring gifts through digital stewardship pilots.

experience.description: Focused on broadcast journalism, community storytelling, and digital media production.
achievements: Founded the Alumni Voices student media collective.
Received Rector’s Award for community leadership.
Completed Erasmus exchange at Boğaziçi University.
